name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 3
description:
An exciting and suspenseful adventure in the world of detectives. Assemble the puzzles and enjoy the colorful and exciting pictures.

The game offers a customizable level of difficulty, a variety of hints when assembling the puzzle, and the ability to save progress and continue playing at any time. The game is suitable for beginners and experienced players alike.

- 500 high quality pictures
- an elaborate game mode with handy hints, sorting and a magnifying glass
- individual setting of each puzzle complexity, allowing you to play an infinite number of times
- Possibility to turn off the rotation mode of puzzle pieces
- function of saving and resuming the process of assembling a puzzle at any time
- Colorful trophies to consolidate your success
